original_text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches, except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you? forgive me this wrong.
korean_text: 내 자신이 너희에게 폐를 끼치지 아니한 일밖에 다른 교회보다 부족하게 한 것이 무엇이 있느냐 너희는 나의 이 공평하지 못한 것을 용서하라

sentences.original_text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches
except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 부담이 되지 않았다는 것을 제외하고는
